reviews.review: "STILL ALIVE"
如此的有趣，以至于无数游戏加入了传送门道具。在有趣的同时，居然让我一个听不懂英文的人感到震慑和感动。片尾曲很棒

Игра очень понравилась, головоломки были легки до 5 уровня, а потом пошёл ступор, еле как прошёл. Но очень интересно и графика не храмает, присутствует русский язык.
Оценка по 5 бальной шкале 4
It's Good.

Very cool and interesting.
Although portals are quite amazing, going/flying through them can be a bit trippy and nauseating at first.
Very enjoyable once you get the hang of it.
11/10, would play again

This is one of the best games I've ever played. I love the story, I love the art, I love the gameplay. Will play again, most likely several times.
11/10
This is really good!!!

portal... portal..portal, que puedo decir de portal 1, es un juego cortisimo, tanto asi que en 3 horas te lo pasas, en historia no se puede comparar con el 2 , eso enmarcaria lo negativo, por otra parte a mi gusto, la mecanica de ir poniendo portales me encanta, hay que aceptar que es original de principio a fin.
Aunque no tanto como en el 2, te encariñas de GLaDOS ya sea por su personalidad o cualquier cosa que esta(GLaDOs) diga o haga). 
bueno ¿portal es un juego recomendable? yo digo que si, pero en OFERTA o en pack BUNDLE, por que por muy bueno que sea el juego si solo  dura 3 horas,te sentiras timado
烧脑，游戏的创意很好。就是感觉好难，教学关没过完就不想玩了。

I kinda somewhat do and don't reccomend this game. In the hour I played it, I got to 15 chambers. It's fun, but not too fun. I bought the Portal and Portal 2 Pack for $5. Not extremely happy with it, IMHO. Don't think I'm impressed enough for a whole playthrough. I gave it an hour. I'm good without it.

This game is one of a kind! so absorving, that when you reach the end, you just want to go back and start all over again! 

Its a must have game for those who like puzzle games, with a whole mixture of adventure, action and so much more!
Un juegazo, se la pasa muy bien

hmm... nah.
It's pretty boring to be honest. It was so boring I felt like vomiting.
I can see why the game mechanics and graphics are fantastic, but these were just tutorials after tutorials, tests after tests, no plot or whatsoever.
Great to check out, but not worth my money, sorry.

Edit: Found out that it's kind of unplayable for me because of my motion sickness.
The cake was great!
Wow this game was hell a nice cant wait to try now portal 2 nice job to all the developers for this game.
Let me just say. It was absolutely awesome playing this game. Especially the ending! I can't spoil it though.
Get it.

[spoiler]the cake is a lie[/spoiler]

[spoiler]the cake is a lie[/spoiler]
Obra maestra. Sencillo y muy adictivo, con un toque de humor por parte de GlaDOS. Algunos puzles son demasiado fáciles, y el juego llega a ser corto. Si te quedas con ganas de más, tienes Portal 2.
Brings back memories of playing portal 2.
The cake is NOT a lie.
Nagyon jó és gondolkodtató logikai játék 10/10

Toda una experiencia.
Los puntos buenos son la creatividad y originalidad de los escenarios,así como de los diálogos con Glados, son una genialidad.
Además, reinventa el plataformeo con una nueva fórmula en la que "Parece que estás boca-abajo".
Como punto malo (que no lo veo tan negativo) es la duración,pero al escribir este analisis me he dado cuenta que si durase más no sería tan intenso.

CONCLUSIÓN: ¿A QUÉ COÑO ESPERAS PARA COMPRARTELO?
amazing great puzzler

Cool game=D 
Love it <3

Отличная игра-головоломка от первого лица с элементами экшена. Сюжет давольно забавный, есть юмор и всякие тайнички. Жаль что такая короткая. Вторая часть конечно всем превосходит первую, но и в это все просто обязаны поиграть.

Si quieres un juego entretenido, con exelentes puzles, dialogos y momentos inolvidables...este es el juego! 

Si bien la campaña es corta, se puede obtener mapas adicionales al terminar el juego, haciendo que la experiencia continue.
Definitivamente un juego indispensable en tu biblioteca de Steam.

Y claro, no te olvides de su continuación (Portal 2), los dos son exelentes!
EL mejor juego que he probado ademas del portal 2.
Рекомедую!
最初は実況見てwinter saleで安いし取り敢えず買って見たけど頑張ってクリアした後のエンディングがちょっと切なくてむっちゃ達成感もあったせいか感動した。ほんとに素晴らしい作品だと思いました。Valveさんありがとうございましたm(_ _)m。
第一个在Steam上通关的游戏，游戏性不错，就是要食脑，对我这种脑残人士算是噩梦，悠闲时候值得一玩，以上。
예전에 나온 게임으로 알고있는데 퀄리티도 높고 재밌어요

All that is needed to be said has been said but to put it bluntly is, "You better start thinking with portals!"  That quote in itself is what describes this game perfectly.  Overall, it is an amazing puzzle game experience with enough intrigue within its own world that I wish would be expanded upon,  yet despite that extremly small misstep it is a very fun game with a pretty good antagonist, GLados, whom with her useof sarcasm and comedy thrown really makes this A.I. program have more character than some in other games.  If I had to give it a score I would say at its worst  the game would be an 8 or (I can see the case for) 7 out of ten and at its height in the  game it is a low 9 or high 8 out of 10

boaaaaah dieses spiel !!!!
es hat so einen scharm und ist sein preiss wirklich wert !! richtig nice, so jetzt kauf ich mir portal 2 :)
想法好，玩起来有意思，果然也是继承了半条命主角无台词，代入感照样好，最后歌很好听！

Portal is a first person puzzle series made by valve themselfs. So before we jump into this review we must praise our lord and savoir Gabe Newell.

There are many more good points than I expected there to be for an 7 year old game. The graphics are very good seeing as the age of the game, you could say it's graphically better than some current ones, no offense to developpers who don't focus on the graphical aspect. You get guided along the way with a robot voice called Glados and I must say she has more humor than the most game characters. For example she says "Your test is almost over and after you"ll be baked and then there will be cake." The humour itself in this game was also very good, the boss level was very entertaining thanks to all the jokes it had and also the ending was pretty ironic because you"ll be the one eating the cake. The ending song was actually amazing, I'm going to download it some time after writing this review. You can solve the puzzles using companion cubes or normal cubes and using your portal gun. The portal gun has two portals a blue one and an orange one and when you pass through one of them you come out of the other one. The controls are not that hard to understand, I barely changed any to my likings. The puzzles get harder each level but there are many useful checkpoints so it makes it not as bad when you die or get stuck.

There are a few minor things about this gem but this are just me noticing details while playing along. You can apparantly save when you are dead or about to respawn rather which is not that useful but I accidentally did that when playing. I was dying from drowning in a puzzle and I saved because I wanted to get back another day and it set my checkpoint to that death so it kept respawning me there. I sometime was doubting if I could portal on some wall or floors. There are three colors in this game, walls or floors rather said, those are black, beige and white. But since beige looks a lot like white you weren't sure if you could portal on it.   

I'm doubting still why you are taking time reading this, still thankful though, and not buying this game. Even at full price at this moment it isn't a waste of money and don't mind the gametime as there are many bonusmaps and such which I didn't dig into (yet).
游戏创意让我眼前一亮。简直太厉害了但是晕3D的我已经吐到脱水。
我玩过的最好玩的游戏，从没有一个游戏能让我玩一个下午的，满分的神作

Ein wunderbares rätsel spiel von Vavle.

I still alive
Aperture Science，
We do what we must because we can.
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.
But there's no sense crying over every mistake.
You just keep on trying till you run out of cake.
And the Science gets done.
And you make a neat gun.
For the people who are still alive.
Now these points of data make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
So I'm GLaD. 
I got burned.
Think of all the things we learned for the people who are still alive。

光圈科技，
我们为所必为，
因为我们无所不能。
现在数据点已经绘出美丽的曲线。
我们即将完成最后测试。
我是如此幸福，即使我被烈火焚身。
——————————————————

Got it on sale, very fun and it doesn't take that much time to complete the game. 7/10

Portal is one of the greatest games ever made. Sure, one could beat it in one afternoon, and the game itself doesn't look as pretty as it once did, although it still looks relatively good, but I can assure you, this game is worth every penny. Portal is about as simple as games get, one must traverse through Aperture Science and attempt to not solve each rooms puzzle. The story is very simple, although there is a great twist at the end, and is mostly sidelined to the FANTASTIC gameplay. There is so much variety in this game and every level is just level after level of pure joy. Whether you're not taking fall damage or getting shot at by the adorable turrets, there is just an assortment of video game brilliance to be found in each corner of Portal. As simple and short as this game is, it must be in every gamers' Steam library. Portal secures a 10/10.
è PROPRIO BELLO

Incredibly fun and mind bending game!
portal

I finally got around to playing this game and it did not disappoint, extremely well designed (hasn't dated at all in the nearly 11 years it's been out), inventive, darkly hilarious and emotionally draining in the best of ways. I felt mentally changed and overwhelmed when I finished it. Yes it is short, but that's perfect for this game. 10/10. Highest possible recommendation.

Уж насколько я на дух не перевариваю паззлы и платформеры, настолько же сильно мне понравился Portal, который объединяет в себе первое и второе. Игра влюбляет в себя какой-то своей неповторимой ламповой атмосферой. Решение головоломок с оригинальными механиками разбавлено здесь научно-фантастическим сюжетом и обаятельными персонажами (образ антагониста - один из самых ярких и запоминающихся персонажей в видеоиграх). В Portal стоит поиграть обязательно, это и увлекательное научно-фантастическое приключение, и действительно уникальный игровой опыт.

不知不觉游戏就通关了，虽然还有很多内容没玩，还是先写一下感受吧。
首先，游戏的创意非常好，通过传送门解谜，利用传送门到达常人无法到达的地点。
其次，游戏细节不错，每一关都有一堆看起来没用的东西放在旁边，虽然实际上这些东西真的没用······但是几乎都可以拿起来。另外，可以通过两扇相对的传送门看到主角自己，类似于照镜子，但因为方向不一样，所以有新鲜感。还可以不穿过传送门直接取走或放置物品，很真实。
最后，游戏剧情很简单，游戏里的音效经过处理，我这个英语渣完全听不出来他在说什么，但还是可以了解到大概剧情。
总之，一个很有创意的游戏，推荐。
